transcript.text: [Music]
[Music]
you
[Music]
hi and welcome you listening to the x22
report my name is Dave and this is
episode 1400 6a and today's date is
October 20th 2017 and the thought of the
episode is the insiders are getting out
of the market they know what's coming
let's get into the economic collapse
financial news now as we know and we've
been reporting on this for quite a while
retail it's continually sliding
declining imploding on itself and the
corporate media the US government the
Fed they've been out there saying that
you know this is the Amazon effect and
everything's going to online but coming
out of the corporate media right now
we're starting to real they're starting
to realize that retail is not going to
get any better anytime soon right now
they are saying that the stress in the
retail sector that has triggered a
string of bankruptcy this year is
unlikely to get much better in 2018
because they're starting to realize and
of course they're building up to that
the economy is getting a lot worse now
we don't know why this is happening we
had this recovery and we could see what
they're trying to do they're saying that
the sector is expected to again produce
the most defaults at up to seven billion
dollars resulting in a ten percent
default rate now during the Great
Recession the default rate was much
higher than that it was something like
17 percent or so and we're approaching
that area once again and what is
happening here is that it's not that
everyone is going to online because all
these companies like Toys R Us
Sears JCPenney all the chain stores they
all have an online presence it's it's
nothing you know special to have your
catalog on the web that's really what it
is I mean back in the day Sears used to
distribute a catalog used to look
through it and you used to order today
that catalog is now on the Internet
everyone has their catalog on the
internet amazon has their catalog on the
internet and they really they have a
couple of stores but they are mostly on
but they like to use Amazon because they
sell pretty much everything and what is
happening here is that they're trying to
explain why all of this is happening and
they're trying to come up with some type
of an excuse
the real problem is is that people today
they've never really recovered from the
2008 crisis now there are certain
individuals and this happens in every
crisis there are certain individuals
that are not affected whatsoever they
get through it no problem they keep
their job they don't really realize that
anything's wrong maybe they're not
getting you know the cost-of-living
raise that they really wanted but
they're able to keep their job other
people were able to keep their job up to
a certain point and maybe last year or
the year before they got laid off and
they started to realize that hey there
are no jobs out there or they went to
find another job and the salary has
dropped quite a bit but they were still
able to get a job but they had to take a
lower salary and then there are those
that got hit very very hard those
individuals that lost everything lost
their pension lost their homes couldn't
find another job if they did it was a
part-time job or a job that was paying a
lot lesson that we're making and they
did whatever they possibly could to
survive during this period of time and a
lot of people had to readjust and
basically change their lives where they
said okay we can't own that house
anymore we can't own this type of car
anymore and they had to make tough
choices some people had to move some
people just left their homes and what is
happening right now is we're coming up
to the point where there's another wave
of this coming and it's going to be very
very difficult on many many individuals
especially those who were not affected
the last time because they've been
sitting in the same exact job and when
layoffs come in once again and you know
this sweeps through many of these
sectors many of the industries people
are going to be shocked and surprised
that wait a minute I was just laid off
I'm putting out my resume I can't find
jobs now they're looking at all these
different stores we know that Toys R Us
they declared bankruptcy but they're
saying and this is coming from Fitch
Petsmart Belk and Taylor parent a Senate
retail group tailored Brands Inc they
are going to be having a huge amount of
problems coming up very very soon and
right now the retail sector accounts for
30% of the defaults that have taken
place in 2017 to date and they're saying
that this is going to increase as we
approach 2018
now the only reason this is going to
increase it's not like all the sales are
moving over to Amazon because we're not
seeing that at all
so the reason why this is increasing is
because the economy is ripping itself
apart it's not because oh wait a minute
online is getting all the sales because
they would show that they would say hey
look we had the retail sales in the
brick-and-mortar business and it was
sales of you know whatever it was a
hundred billion dollars and now amazon
is now receiving a hundred billion
dollars more you're not seeing that so
this whole idea that Amazon is stealing
everything is really not true because
the online business is only 10% of the
total retail sales now we talked about
the market and how certain institutional
investors they know what is happening in
the market they know when to get out of
the market these are the insiders and
what we see and this is coming out of
Bank of America they compiled this fun
flow data and this is coming from
Michael Hartnett and they're saying that
these institutional investors these
insiders well they're starting to move
out of their stocks so stock holding
rotation is accelerating right now and
they're seeing another 8.8 billion
allocated to equities more than all of
it from retail investors and another 5.8
billion going into bonds so what they're
saying is that there's a huge amount of
insider institutional investors they are
getting out of stocks right now and
there is a really great chart that shows
this where you can see the institutional
investors they've been selling like
crazy
there's a reason why they're doing this
because they understand that the market
has hit all-time new highs it's
overvalued we see stories coming out of
Yahoo Finance coming out of Market Watch
coming out of many of these financial
type of websites magazines and they're
all saying the same thing right now and
this is the propaganda that leads up to
the market coming down because once they
start dropping these type of articles we
saw it back in 2008 where they started
to mention the market coming down
because they liked to be covered to say
hey listen we were on top of this we're
telling you exactly what is happening
and remember the economy hasn't changed
we're still running under the Obama
recovery right now and we knew and the
Fed knew the government knew that this
recovery was only going to last a
certain period of time and here we are
right now at the end stage of it because
the Federal Reserve there's no place for
them to go they can try to unwind they
can't really raise rates they'll bring
down the economy if they try raising it
1 or 2 more times it's going to be a
complete disaster deutsche bank ordered
reported on that same length and if they
move the rates up a little bit more it's
going to be a total disaster we saw what
happened when they raised the rates with
the mortgage applications with
refinancing applications with housing it
all fell apart so here we are right now
and we're starting to see many different
signs a lot of indicators showing that
we are already in this recession it's
getting worse and I'm saying that we
were in this recessions this recession
going back to 2016 everything is in a
bubble we're starting to see the housing
bubbles they are popping in Canada
they're deflating in Australia we're
seeing in the UK we're seeing it here in
the United States we're seeing homes on
the market longer and longer and I'm not
saying it's happening in every single
place it doesn't happen all in one place
at the same exact time go back to 2006
2007 Miami down in the Florida area they
were building like crazy it hit first in
the northeastern area actually hit first
out in California the rest of the
country said I don't understand what's
going on here I don't know why these
people leaving their homes why building
has coming to a screeching halt because
we're
building like crazy here we have
contracts you know out the window and
then all of a sudden six to eight months
later everything came to a halt
buildings were empty people backed out
because a lot of it was speculation and
everything started to fall apart so if
you're in that area where things are
great right now it's going to catch up
to you slowly but surely and over the
period of time that we've been talking
about all this people have been writing
in saying yes at one point I wrote in to
you and I said things were great in my
area and now a year later all of a
sudden things have gone the opposite way
where people are trying to sell their
houses they're scratching their head
saying I don't understand why I can't
get the money for this house why do I
have to keep lowering it why is it on
the market for such a long period of
time and this is what happened in 2008 a
lot of realtors a lot of individuals
didn't understand what was going on they
didn't understand what happened why did
the traffic dry up well that's because
the whole thing was an illusion it was
fake and of course the corporate media
the Fed they were out there still
telling people that this is you know
fantastic housing is going to keep going
up sales are incredible things are
fantastic don't worry about it and
people are saying mold maybe is
something I was doing maybe I didn't
plant flowers maybe I need to cut the
lawn maybe I have to fix the inside of
the house and people tried all these
different things but guess what nobody
came because that wasn't the problem
the problem was the economy was breaking
down this is what we're seeing right now
the economy is slowly breaking down it's
been slowly breaking down for quite a
while because it took a long time for
the Fed to pump all this up and now
we're on the downside and things are
getting worse and worse and this is why
you need to be ready and prepared for
what is coming because once it hits
you're not gonna have any time to do
anything you're not gonna be able to run
out of this out to the store you're not
gonna be able to run to the gas station
you're not gonna say oh let me get all
my supplies now think about all the
individuals in Florida and Texas when
the hurricane was approaching every
single person ran to the gas station
there were lines like you couldn't
believe it was you know 50 60 70 cars
and by the time he got to the pumps the
gas was completely gone store shelves if
he were looking
for water completely gone the same
things going to happen when inflation
hits the same thing is going to happen
when the credit crisis hits people are
gonna sit here and say I better run to
the store and there's going to be tons
of people running to the store trying to
get whatever they possibly can now of
course people aren't gonna realize this
because the corporate media the
government is going to tell them that
everything is fine but there are gonna
be certain individuals that will be
stocking up on this stuff other people
will get wind of this and it will slowly
all of a sudden happen where everyone is
running to the store you don't want to
be caught up on this that you want to be
prepared you want to have your water you
want to have your food you want to have
your supplies you want to have cash on
hand because you'll be using that first
you need gold and silver to protect your
wealth you might even want to have some
cryptocurrency
just let it sit there but you're going
to need all these sighs toilet paper
medical supplies you will need this
because I'm not saying that we're gonna
have a Mad Max scenario but what's going
to happen is these things are gonna be
hard to get or we're gonna see inflation
and they're gonna become very very
expensive and then eventually they'll
become hard to get so you need to get
ready and prepared for what is coming
because we can see there are so many
indicators right now that are pointing
to this entire system coming down the
insiders already know if they already
know and they're already preparing for
this you need to prepare for this listen
everyone thanks a lot for listening be
well be safe and especially be prepared
thanks a lot
[Music]
you
you
